text: Members of the Advisory Neighborhood Commissions which are established pursuant to the provisions of this part shall:

DC CODE § 1-309.33

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Be nominated in the manner prescribed in § 1-309.05(b); and

part.text: Additional Period for Circulation of Petitions.
